mpicxx  -g -Wl,-rpath -Wl,/usr/lib/openmpi/lib -Wl,--enable-new-dtags -pthread  CMakeFiles/main.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/image.cpp.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/union_find.cpp.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/utils.cpp.o  -o main -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/openmpi/lib:/usr/local/lib /usr/lib/openmpi/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/lib/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_superres.so.3.4.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_shape.so.3.4.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_stitching.so.3.4.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_viz.so.3.4.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ml.so.3.4.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videostab.so.3.4.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.3.4.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_video.so.3.4.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_dnn.so.3.4.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_photo.so.3.4.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_objdetect.so.3.4.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_features2d.so.3.4.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.3.4.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videoio.so.3.4.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_flann.so.3.4.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.so.3.4.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.3.4.2 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.3.4.2
